DOC.criteria: Healthy subject age 18 45 year inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 inclusive Body weight 50 100 kg inclusive Women must either postmenopausal , permanently sterilise , childbearing potential , must negative pregnancy test intake study medication use reliable form contraception participation study . Significant illness ( include ongoing history liver disease ) , trauma surgical procedure 2 week preentry visit first administration Investigational Product Clinical significant abnormality clinical chemistry , haematology urinalysis result include positive result screen test serum hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C antibody HIV positive FHb result preentry History bleeding disturbance ( include extensive menstrual bleeding ) thrombotic disorder Clinically significant medical history , judge investigator , include psychiatric disorder severe allergy .
